# Blades of Fire (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]]) \[[[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[2nd Level Warmage Spells|Warmage 2]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Touch

**Targets:** Up to two melee weapons you are wielding

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 31

*With a word your weapons burst into flame. You feel no heat and the flames merely tickle your skin.*

Your melee weapons each deal an extra 1d8 points of fire damage. This damage stacks with any energy damage your weapons already deal.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Warmage 2 to Level per Complete Arcane.
